tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_filings (
    filing_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    filing_date DATE,
    advisor_name VARCHAR(255),
    filing_document BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_filings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    filing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    company_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    filing_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    filing_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_filings (
  filing_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  filing_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  filing_date DATE,
  filing_type VARCHAR(50),
  advisor_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
  document_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_content TEXT,
  advisor_id INT,
  document_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE advisors (
  advisor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  advisor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  advisor_license VARCHAR(20),
  advisor_type VARCHAR(50),
  advisor_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    advisor_id INT,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_date DATE,
    document_file BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_filings (
    filing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    advisor_id INT,
    filing_type VARCHAR(50),
    filing_date DATE,
    filing_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    advisor_id INT,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_date DATE,
    document_text TEXT
);
